title: AWS Customers Cannot Escape IPv4
dot: digraph aws_ipv4_charge{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=lightgrey, fontname="Arial"];edge[fontname="Arial"];subgraph cluster_intro{label="Introduction & Context";style=filled;color=lightblue;a[label="AWS announces charge for public IPv4 addresses"];b[label="Goal: Encourage IPv6 adoption"];}subgraph cluster_problem{label="The Problem";style=filled;color=lightcoral;c[label="Charge won't significantly impact IPv6 adoption"];d[label="AWS IPv6 support has huge gaps, hindering IPv4 migration"];e[label="Many AWS services lack IPv6 support"];f[label="Difficult/impossible to run IPv6-only or even dual-stack"];{rank=same;e;f;}}subgraph cluster_impact{label="Impact";style=filled;color=lightgoldenrod;g[label="Larger customers unaffected (cost negligible)"];h[label="Smaller customers impacted but cannot avoid cost (lack of IPv6 support)"];i[label="Stifles innovation and personal accounts"];}subgraph cluster_conclusion{label="Conclusion";style=filled;color=lightgreen;j[label="IPv4 charge itself is reasonable"];k[label="AWS should improve IPv6 support to be a role model"];l[label="Charge won't drive adoption under current circumstances"];}a->c;b->d;d->e;d->f;c->g;c->h;h->i;c->l;g->j;d->k;k->l;}

title: Working remotely can more than halve an office employee’s carbon footprint
dot: digraph G{rankdir=LR;nodesep=0.5;subgraph cluster_benefits{label="Potential Benefits of Remote Work";style="rounded,filled";color="#e0e0e0";"Reduced Emissions"[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#90ee90"];"Improved Worker Health"[shape=box];}subgraph cluster_challenges{label="Challenges & Considerations";style="rounded,filled";color="#e0e0e0";"Increased Non-Commute Travel"[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#ffcccb"];"Increased Home Energy Use"[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#ffcccb"];"Suburban/Rural Relocation"[shape=box];"Office Building Efficiency"[shape=box];}subgraph cluster_solutions{label="Mitigation Strategies";style="rounded,filled";color="#e0e0e0";"Home Energy Conservation"[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#90ee90"];"Electric Vehicles"[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#90ee90"];"Renewable Energy Sources"[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#90ee90"];"Green Office Buildings"[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#90ee90"];"Public Transit"[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#90ee90"];}"Remote Work"[shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor="#add8e6"];"Remote Work"->"Reduced Emissions"[label="Up to 54% if\nmitigation\nstrategies used"];"Remote Work"->"Improved Worker Health";"Remote Work"->"Increased Non-Commute Travel";"Remote Work"->"Increased Home Energy Use";"Remote Work"->"Suburban/Rural Relocation"[style=dashed, label="Potential"];"Remote Work"->"Office Building Efficiency"[style=dashed, label="Comparison"];"Home Energy Conservation"->"Reduced Emissions";"Electric Vehicles"->"Reduced Emissions";"Renewable Energy Sources"->"Reduced Emissions";"Green Office Buildings"->"Reduced Emissions"[style=dashed];"Public Transit"->"Reduced Emissions"[style=dashed];}
